com.rbs.transfer.exception.handler

Class CustomExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
      • com.rbs.transfer.exception.handler.BaseExceptionHandler
        • com.rbs.transfer.exception.handler.CustomExceptionHandler

  • @ControllerAdvice
public class CustomExceptionHandler
extends BaseExceptionHandler
    Responsible with business exception handling, only handle business/functional exceptions. Extends BaseExceptionHandler
